product_name: Partners West Where to Bike: Los Angeles Mountain Biking
long_description: Feeling trapped by a busy urban environment? Relief is closer than you think! Get out and explore the trails surrounding LA with the guidance of Where to Bike: Los Angeles Mountain Biking.
short_description: Feeling trapped by a busy urban environment? Relief is closer than you think! Get out and explore the trails surrounding LA with the guidance of Where to Bike: Los Angeles Mountain Biking.
